Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to allowing licensed estheticians and licensed cosmetologists to practice microneedling
Summary: Allows licensed estheticians and licensed cosmetologists to practice microneedling upon completion of a five hour course.
LawCode: Amd ยง400, add ยง404-d, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to allowing licensed estheticians and licensed cosmetologists to practice microneedling
